title: Is Marilyn Manson a person or a band? - Quora

response.answer_text: Originally the band was called Marilyn Manson and the Spooky Kids. Every band member had a pseudonym composed by the first name of a super model and the second name of a serial killer: Twiggy Ramirez (bass), Madonna Wayne-Gacy (keyboards), Sara Lee Lucas (drums), Daisy Berkowitz (guitar) and Marilyn Manson, the singer (his real name is Brian Warner). Then, as time passed, the Marilyn Manson character got more attention than the rest and they shortened the band’s name to Marilyn Manson.So now, when people and friends address the singer, they call him “Mr. Manson”. Very interesting and intelligent character, Mr. Manson.
It was his band name when he first appeared as a soloist with his band with other members. Later on he took the name as his stage name after the band members were separated.
